message: But I don't have long to mourn. In moments, the pure white field starts to fill with color.
In the blink of an eye, I'm standing on a beach at twilight.
I remember this place...
I was here once before, long ago in my childhood. Though the memory is vague, the impression it left on me remains strong.
I was sitting on the beach alone, watching the ocean, when someone started talking to me...
That person was...
...Dad?
Yes... Now I remember.
As a child, I lived in my own little world, empty but for me and my imaginary friends.
Dad was the one who changed all that.
I was born in a lab, so we weren't blood-related, but I'll always think of him as my dad.
He tore open my world and filled it with light.
"Don't worry," he told me. "Worlds can always be destroyed."
But now... "I'm" standing where Dad stood.
The pure-white me has taken on my current appearance.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."
Ren turns to me, his expression grave.

name: 蓮
message: "We were all originally you. One mind split into three."

name: 蓮
message: "Normally, to restore your mind, you would have to reintegrate both of us. We would disappear."

name: 蓮
message: "But I am separate from you now. You've accepted me. You've recognized me as my own person. I will not disappear."

name: 蓮
message: "But you haven't accepted him. He's trapped. Until you accept him as part of you, he'll never be free."
I look again at the other me. I thought him expressionless, but now I can see the loneliness in his eyes.
I've always thought of him as an enemy, a malevolent force bent on taking control.
But as I look into "my" face, I wonder if I was wrong.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I was afraid of my power, of Scrap. Going inside a person's mind to destroy them... How was that any different from murder?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I was scared of my power... No, that's not right. Part of me liked it, liked being unstoppable. It made me feel superior. That's what really scared me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But when I went too far in Rhyme, it made me realize what I'd become. I was so scared. I didn't know what to do. So I tried to forget."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I tried to forget what had happened. To forget about Scrap. But that also meant forgetting you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I turned my back on you, on myself, and tried to live the quietest, most normal life I could imagine..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you didn't want to be forgotten. That's what you've been trying to tell me all this time. That you're part of me. That you're here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought you wanted to destroy me, so I pushed you away. But that was just me being selfish, refusing to see the truth..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sei told me I needed to try and understand. I never tried with you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But now, I'm gonna stop running. I'm gonna stop pushing you away. You're part of me. You belong inside me―now and forever."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm sorry for everything."
Once I've finished, I approach my other self.
His body trembles faintly as he sighs.
I see a thousand thoughts and feelings swirling in his eyes.
He lifts a hand. I bring mine up to meet it... palm to palm.
Where our skin touches, a gentle heat grows.
Watching me with glistening eyes, he slowly parts his lips.

name: 白蒼葉
message: "Thank... you..."
His voice, thick with emotion... bursts into dazzling light.
When I open my eyes again, he's gone.
